fields.title: NHL Highlights | Red Wings vs. Avalanche - March 26, 2025
fields.description: Devon Toews racked up three points and Nathan MacKinnon added a goal and an assist as the Colorado Avalanche won their 10th straight on home ice defeating the Detroit Red Wings 5-2 #NHL

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Blues vs. Canadiens - March 25, 2025
fields.description:
Philip Broberg and Robert Thomas combine for eight points with a goal and three assists each to lead the St. Louis Blues to a dominant 6-1 over the Montreal Canadiens.

#NHL

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Capitals vs. Jets - March 25, 2025
fields.description: Alexander Ovechkin scored goal No. 889, but it was Nikolaj Ehlers who delivered the game-winner as the Winnipeg Jets knocked off the Washington Capitals 3-2 in overtime.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Kraken vs. Flames - March 25, 2025
fields.description: Nazem Kadri added two goals to his season tally, including the overtime winner, and the Calgary Flames defeated the Seattle Kraken 4-3.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Canucks vs. Islanders - March 26, 2025
fields.description: Kiefer Sherwood had a three-point night and Thatcher Demko stopped 26 shots as the Vancouver Canucks handled the New York Islanders 5-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Devils vs. Blackhawks - March 26, 2025
fields.description: Luke Hughes tied his career-high with three assists as the New Jersey Devils rode five different goal scorers to defeat the Chicago Blackhawks 5-3.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Stars vs. Oilers - March 26, 2025
fields.description: Jason Robertson scored three goals in the second period to record his first career natural hat trick as the Dallas Stars held off the Edmonton Oilers' comeback bid to pick up a 4-3 win.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Bruins vs. Ducks - March 26, 2025
fields.description: Leo Carlsson scored a pair of goals and Jackson LaCombe added a couple of points of his own as the Anaheim Ducks crushed the Boston Bruins 6-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Penguins vs. Sabres - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Sidney Crosby scored a goal to break Wayne Gretzky's point-per-game seasons record but it was not enough as the Buffalo Sabres crushed the Pittsburgh Penguins 7-3.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Utah HC vs. Lightning - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Oliver Bjorkstrand and Jake Guentzel tallied two goals a piece and Andrei Vasilevskiy made 25 saves in a shutout effort as the Tampa Bay Lightning crushed the Utah Hockey Club 8-0.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Senators vs. Red Wings - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Tim Stutzle buried his 21st goal of the season, Michael Amadio scored the eventual game-winner, and the Ottawa Senators earned a 4-3 win over the Detroit Red Wings.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Capitals vs. Wild - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Frederick Gaudreau scored a pair of goals and Matt Boldy chipped in with a goal and an assist as the Minnesota Wild defeated the Washington Capitals 4-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Stars vs. Flames - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Casey DeSmith made 46 saves on the night, Roope Hintz, Mikko Rantanen and Matt Duchene each had a goal and an assist, and the Dallas Stars took care of the Calgary Flames 5-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Oilers vs. Kraken - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Jaden Schwartz added two goals to his season tally, Andre Burakovsky and Jared McCann each had a goal and an assist, and the Seattle Kraken cruised to a 6-1 win over the Edmonton Oilers.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Maple Leafs vs. Sharks - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Tyler Toffoli had two goals and three points, William Eklund added a goal and an assist, and the San Jose Sharks edged out a 6-5 win over the Toronto Maple Leafs after a shootout.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Kings vs. Avalanche - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Martin Necas scored two goals and added an assist while Cale Makar had two helpers of his own as the Colorado Avalanche shut out the Los Angeles Kings 4-0.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Blues vs. Predators - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Dylan Holloway scored a pair of goals to lead the St. Louis Blues to a 3-2 victory over the Nashville Predators.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Canadiens vs. Flyers - March 27, 2025
fields.description: Matvei Michkov and Sean Couturier each scored a pair of goals as the Philadelphia Flyers topped the Montreal Canadiens 6-4.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Canadiens vs. Hurricanes - March 28, 2025
fields.description: Jackson Blake led the offence with a goal and two assists and Seth Jarvis chipped in with a pair of helpers as the Carolina Hurricanes defeated the Montreal Canadiens 4-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Utah HC vs. Panthers - March 28, 2025
fields.description: Sam Bennett scored a pair of goals including the OT-winner set up by Brad Marchand his debut effort as the Florida Panthers edged the Utah Hockey Club 2-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Golden Knights vs. Blackhawks - March 28, 2025
fields.description: Victor Olofsson scored twice and William Karlsson dished out three assists to lead the Vegas Golden Knights to a 5-3 victory over the Chicago Blackhawks.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Devils vs. Jets - March 28, 2025
fields.description: Alex Iaffalo tallied a pair of goals, Mark Scheifele snapped a nine-game goal drought and Connor Hellebuyck made 24 saves in a shutout effort as the Winnipeg Jets blanked the New Jersey Devils 4-0.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Rangers vs. Ducks - March 28, 2025
fields.description: Leo Carlsson led the offence with a goal and three assists and Mason McTavish buried the overtime winner to elevate the Anaheim Ducks to a 5-4 win over the New York Rangers.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Canucks vs. Blue Jackets - March 28, 2025
fields.description: Boone Jenner had two goals and three points, Dante Fabbro added a goal and three points of his own, and the Columbus Blue Jackets won a wild 7-6 game against the Vancouver Canucks following a shootout.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Sabres vs. Flyers - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Matvei Michkov scored a pair of goals and Noah Cates had three points on the day as the Philadelphia Flyers topped the Buffalo Sabres 7-4.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Islanders vs. Lightning - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Nikita Kucherov continued his terrific season with another four-point game, while Brayden Point also added two goals, as the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the New York Islanders 5-3.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Blues vs. Avalanche - March 29, 2025
fields.description: The St. Louis Blues just can’t lose as Jordan Binnington made 28 saves and Pavel Buchnevich scored his 15th goal of the season that ended up being the game winner as the Blues extend their win streak to nine games, beating the Colorado Avalanche 2-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Golden Knights vs. Predators - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Jack Eichel continued adding to his career-high point total with his 27th goal of the season while Reilly Smith scored his first goal since rejoining the club as the Vegas Golden Knights beat the Nashville Predators 3-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Devils vs. Wild - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Nico Hischier found the back of the net three times for his second career hat trick while Paul Cotter also scored his 16th goal of the season as the New Jersey Devils beat the Minnesota Wild 5-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Bruins vs. Red Wings - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Marco Kasper opened the scoring with 15th of the season and Lucas Raymond buried the game-winning goal on the power play to lead the Detroit Red Wings past the Boston Bruins 2-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Blue Jackets vs. Senators - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Ridly Greig had a goal and added an assist on Jake Sanderson’s goal in the second period that ended up being the game-winning goal as the Ottawa Senators beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 3-2 earning a huge two points.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Rangers vs. Sharks - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Artemi Panarin and Adam Fox each had a pair of goals, while Jonathan Quick made 21 saves to help the New York Rangers beat the San Jose Sharks 6-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Flames vs. Oilers - March 29, 2025
fields.description: Leon Draisaitl left his mark on this version of the Battle of Alberta, scoring his 50th goal to tie the game late in the third period and his 51st as the overtime winner as the Edmonton Oilers beat the Calgary Flames 3-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Maple Leafs vs. Kings - March 29, 2025
fields.description: John Tavares added two goals to his season tally, Auston Matthews added a goal and an assist, and the Toronto Maple Leafs earned a 3-1 win over the Los Angeles Kings.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Stars vs. Kraken - March 29, 2025
fields.description: The Dallas Stars kept rolling vs the Seattle Kraken as Jason Robertson, Wyatt Johnston and Mikko Rantanen all found the back of the net as the Stars beat the Kraken 5-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Canadiens vs. Panthers - March 30, 2025
fields.description: Lane Hutson recorded three assists, bringing his season total to 54, while Nick Suzuki scored the game-winning goal as part of his three-point performance to help lead the Montreal Canadiens to a 4-2 victory over the Florida Panthers.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Sabres vs. Capitals - March 30, 2025
fields.description: Alex Tuch had a three-point day and Tage Thompson scored twice as the Buffalo Sabres topped the Washington Capitals 8-5 in a high-scoring affair.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Hockey Club vs. Blackhawks - March 30, 2025
fields.description: Alexander Kerfoot had himself a game with one goal and two assists while Mikhail Sergachev added a goal and assist himself as the Utah Hockey Club beat the Chicago Blackhawks 5-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Senators vs. Penguins - March 30, 2025
fields.description: It was a battle of the goaltenders until overtime when Pittsburgh Penguins captain Sidney Crosby punched through for his 27th of the season as the Penguins wins 1-0 over the Ottawa Senators.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Islanders vs. Hurricanes - March 30, 2025
fields.description: It was a points night for multiple Carolina Hurricanes, including Sebastian Aho who had a goal and two assists while Seth Jarvis got his 28th and 29h goals of the season as the Hurricanes beat the New York Islanders 6-4.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Maple Leafs vs. Ducks - March 30, 2025
fields.description: Max Domi, Mitch Marner and Steven Lorentz each scored while Joseph Woll made 28 saves to lead the Toronto Maple Leafs to a 3-2 win over the Anaheim Ducks.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Sharks vs. Kings - March 30, 2025
fields.description: Warren Foegele and Adrian Kempe each scored two goals while Andrei Kuzmenko scored a goal of his own and added two assists as the Los Angeles Kings dominated the San Jose Sharks in a 8-1 victory.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Canucks vs. Jets - March 30, 2025
fields.description: Kyler Connor ripped his 38th goal of the season while Cole Perfetti got his 16th of the season as the Winnipeg Jets beat the Vancouver Canucks 3-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Stars vs. Kraken - March 31, 2025
fields.description: Casey DeSmith made 36 saves and Wyatt Johnston’s goal held up as the game-winner as the Dallas Stars topped the Seattle Kraken 3-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Flames vs. Avalanche - March 31, 2025
fields.description: Adam Klapka tallied the game-tying goal in the third period, while Dan Vladar made 28 saves and was perfect in the shootout to lead the Calgary Flames to a 3-2 squeaker over the Colorado Avalanche.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Devils vs. Wild - March 31, 2025
fields.description: Jacob Markstrom came up big in the shootout, closing the door on Mats Zuccarello and Matt Boldy and saving 27 of 29 shots against to help lead the New Jersey Devils to a 3-2 shootout win over the Minnesota Wild.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Predators vs. Flyers - March 31, 2025
fields.description: Jamie Drysdale scored the game-winner midway through the second period and Ivan Fedotov made 28 saves as the Philadelphia Flyers edged the Nashville Predators 2-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Panthers vs. Canadiens - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Nick Suzuki played hero scoring the game-tying goal in the dying seconds of the third and following it up with the OT-winner to lead the Montreal Canadiens to a thrilling win over the Florida Panthers 3-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Sabres vs. Senators - April 1, 2025
fields.description: James Reimer stopped 33 shots on the night, Rasmus Dahlin had a goal and an assist, and the Buffalo Sabres cruised to a 5-2 win over the shorthanded Ottawa Senators.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Jets vs. Kings - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Andrei Kuzmenko recorded a goal and an assist, Darcy Kuemper stopped 18 shots on the night, and the Los Angeles Kings handled the Winnipeg Jets 4-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Oilers vs. Golden Knights - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Jake Walman scored his first goal in an Oilers jersey, Leon Draisaitl notched his 52nd goal of the season, and the Edmonton Oilers topped the Vegas Golden Knights 3-2.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Sharks vs. Ducks - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Mason McTavish dished out three assists, Trevor Zegras had a goal and an assist, and the Anaheim Ducks topped the San Jose Sharks 4-3 following a shootout.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Capitals vs. Bruins - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Dylan Strome had a goal and an assist, Alex Ovechkin scored his 38th goal of the season, and the Washington Capitals edged out a 4-3 win over the Boston Bruins.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Predators vs. Blue Jackets - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Kirill Marchenko tallied a hat trick and Sean Monahan had a four-point night as the Columbus Blue Jackets blew out the Nashville Predators 8-4.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Flames vs. Utah HC - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Karel Vejmelka stopped 34 of 35 shots, while nine different players picked up a point for the Utah Hockey Club as they defeated the Calgary Flames 3-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Red Wings vs. Blues - April 1, 2025
fields.description: Jordan Binnington made 20 saves and Cam Fowler potted the game-winning goal as the St. Louis Blues topped the Detroit Red Wings 2-1 in overtime for their 10th win in a row.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Wild vs. Rangers - April 2, 2025
fields.description: Artemi Panarin had himself a night with a goal and two assists, including one on the overtime winner which Vincent Trocheck was able to bury for the New York Rangers as they beat the Minnesota Wild 5-4.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Capitals vs. Hurricanes - April 2, 2025
fields.description: Jackson Blake recorded his 13th and 14th goals of the season while Seth Jarvis reached the 30-goal mark for the second straight year as the Carolina Hurricanes beat the Washington Capitals 5-1.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Kraken vs. Canucks - April 2, 2025
fields.description: Jared McCann dished out a pair of assists, Joey Daccord stopped all 25 shots he faced, and the Seattle Kraken blanked the Vancouver Canucks 5-0.

fields.title: NHL Highlights | Panthers vs. Maple Leafs - April 2, 2025
fields.description:
Mitch Marner scored a late clutch goal and helped set up the eventual game-winning tally and Anthony Stolarz came up huge with 29 saves as the Toronto Maple Leafs held their ground at the top of the Atlantic Division edging the Florida Panthers 3-2.

LIVE Post-Game:  https://youtube.com/live/0ebeDQDXmn4?feature=share

fields.title: NHL Buzz: Draisaitl out for Oilers against Jets
